00009         // Apple's kludge so that changes to the NSColorWells in Preferences window
00010         // are propagated to the outline immediately.  See:
00011         // http://developer.apple.com/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/StoringNSColorInDefaults.html
00012         // at the bottom of the page, "Declare an NSColor property of the custom view class...."
00013         // This is the custom view class.
00014         NSColor* colorSortable ;
00015         NSColor* colorUnsortable ;
00016 }
